column2: longitudinal <- select(longitudinal, student, sex, job, everything())
longitudinal_wide <- pivot_wider(longitudinal, id_cols = student:job, names_from = occas, names_prefix = "occas_", values_from = gpa)
longitudinal_long <- pivot_longer(longitudinal_wide, cols = occas_0:occas_5, names_to = "occas", names_prefix = "occas_", values_to = "gpa")
